definition: to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: The acryl bottle opener, the refrigerator stick, the cup mat etc. product.
sentences.chinese: 壓克力開瓶器，冰箱貼，杯墊等產品。

sentences.english: It's kind of a  bottle opener which can also be used to  peel vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 這種開瓶器可以用來給蔬菜削皮。

sentences.english: Almost any goodcanned opener should raise attraction too.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎任何好的罐頭開瓶器應該引起吸引力。

sentences.english: A bottle opener is a kitchen gadget.
How did you open the bottle without a bottle-opener?
sentences.chinese: 你不用開瓶器是怎麼把瓶子打開的？

sentences.english: Do we have a bottle opener on the list, Marilyn?
The other opener when the shelf life also would like to protect shipping.
sentences.chinese: 其他的開瓶器也希望能保時保質出貨。

sentences.english: Just install a beer bottle opener on the side of the chassis.
sentences.chinese: 只需安裝一對機箱側面啤酒開瓶器。

sentences.english: This bottle-opener is just a gift from our shop. Thank you for coming.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝您的光臨，這個開瓶器是我們店送給你的贈品。

sentences.english: Don't use this corkscrew for plastic cork and sparking wine.
sentences.chinese: 切忌用此開瓶器開啓塑膠瓶塞和汽酒。

sentences.english: Beer bottle cake with giant coaster, bottle cap and bottle opener. [link]
sentences.chinese: 配有巨大杯墊，瓶蓋和開瓶器的啤酒瓶蛋糕。

sentences.english: A device or contrivance; a gadget.
I bought a bottle opener yesterday.
It's in the right-hand drawer, next to the bottle openers.
sentences.chinese: 在右手邊的抽屜裏，就在開瓶器旁邊。

sentences.english: It's in the right-hand drawer, next to the bottle openers .
sentences.chinese: 在右邊的吵樘就在開瓶器旁邊。

sentences.english: It's in the righthand drawer next to the bottle openers.
sentences.chinese: 在右邊的抽屜裏就在開瓶器旁邊。

definition: ring pull (can)/strap handle (on bus or train)/circular door handle
to spread litter in a cowshed, pigsty etc
to click (using a mouse or other pointing device)
